official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a limit on the retirement pay and annuities for retired Federal civilian and military personnel which is based on the rate of pay payable for those in active service.

summary.text: Prohibits the amount of any annuity or retired pay payable to any person by the Federal Government or the District of Columbia government from exceeding the person's basic pay rate immediately before separation from service.
